answer: Who shot me, but ya punk didn't finish
details: The biggest diss track in the rap industry, which insulted various East Coast rappers, such as Biggie and Puffy.

challenge.prompt: Complete the lyrics of 2Pac's Hit 'Em Up.
challenge.text:
♫ Grab ya glocks, when you see Tupac 
 Call the cops, when you see Tupac, uh
 ... .... .., ... .. .... ....'. ......' 
Now ya bout to feel the wrath of a menace  
N----, we hit em' up ♫
